sect1.title: Installation of KDE Network

para.screen: Estimated build disk space: 52 MB Estimated installed space: 16 MB Package size: &kde-network-size; Estimated build time: 28 min (667 MHz)

sect1.para: Install kdenetwork with: ./configure --prefix=&kde-dir; --enable-objprelink \ --disable-debug --disable-dependency-tracking && make && make install

sect2.title: Configuring kdenetwork
sect2.para: There is no explicit configuration for the kde network package, however individual packages need to be set up with user information.
